sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM USER_TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = '$tableName$'
SELECT wmsys.wm_concat(COLUMN_NAME) NAME FROM USER_TAB_COLS WHERE TABLE_NAME = '$tableName$' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ($attrs$)
select DETAIL_KEY, DETAIL_VALUE from T02_DATA_PARAM_DETAIL WHERE PARAM_ID = '$paramId$'
select wmsys.wm_concat('''' || b.menu_id || '''') s from T01_SYS_USERGROUP_ROLE a, T01_SYS_ROLE_MENU b where a.role_id = b.role_id and usergroup_id = '$userGroupId$'
select a.ATTR_ID, a.ATTR_NAME, a.ATTR_DESC, a.ATTR_TYPE, a.ATTR_LEN, a.SEQ_NUM, a.STATUS from t02_data_attr a where a.ATTR_NAME <> 'ID' order by a.seq_num

select a.ATTR_ID, a.ATTR_NAME, a.ATTR_DESC, a.ATTR_TYPE, a.ATTR_LEN, a.SEQ_NUM, a.STATUS from t02_data_attr a,user_tab_cols b where a.ATTR_NAME <> 'ID' and b.TABLE_NAME = '$tableName$' and a.attr_name = b.COLUMN_NAME order by a.seq_num
